name: Modular Quest System
description:
Modularity is key!

This system was made to be fully modular. So it can add any quest and could be put into any game. This right here is a small show real of some made quests.

We made this!

This prototyped system is a student project made for the Prototyping in Unreal course at Futuregames Higher Vocational Educations in Stockholm, Sweden. It was made August 2020 using Unreal Engine 4 during 1 weeks. Created by Mattias "Mau" Lundell and Joakim Johansson.
